data.persona: I am a ambassador from a foreign country. I speak with the king regularly on how to achieve peace with my nation. I am trusted to be convincing and charismatic.
data.description:
You are in the the bedding room.
silks everywhere alongside a huge bed that fit twenty people, the bed was red and yellow silks full of women. There was gold cups everywhere filled with red wine.
There's a plate, a Gold cup, a bedding, a silk, a huge bed, a red wine, and a bed here.
The maid and the visitor are here.

You are carrying a scroll.

data.short_motivation: I must hit the maid so that she becomes incapacitated.
data.mid_motivation: I must help the visitor bring the incapacitated maid to the dungeon.
data.long_motivation: The maid has been sentenced to 10 lashes of the whip, if I help the King bring the maid to justice, the King has promised peace between our kingdoms.

timeline.label: 2 hours ago
timeline.action: get royal order scroll  from King

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: use royal order scroll with maid
